mcq.statement: Select the correct sentence: Farid and Naseem both are good swimmers., Swimmers are good both Farid and Naseem., Both Farid and Naseem are good swimmers., None of these

options.a: Farid and Naseem both are good swimmers.
options.b: Swimmers are good both Farid and Naseem.
options.c: Both Farid and Naseem are good swimmers.
